name: The Colonel
description: Has spent decades—perhaps his entire adult life—laying siege to the Tower of Mirado. Was a boy when the siege started, now a grandfather.

name: Fincho
description: The Colonel's faithful second-in-command. Follows from loyalty that has become his life's anchor. Cannot last more than a week without searching when the Colonel wanders.

name: The Boss
description: Designed most of the traps still in use. Practical, ugly in her methods, but effective. Disappeared during the Redmane Expedition in March 855.

name: Chief Archivist Mink
description: Oversees apprentice archivists and the records division of the Capital Archives.
appears_in_courses: Yeller Quarry Data Science; Capital Archives NLP

name: Grigsu Haldo
description: Third-rate scholar and archivist who became obsessed with Yeller. Wandered from Dens to Dead River to the Quarry. Died changed—sullen and angry.

name: Bagbu Olt
description: Travels in a pickbox cart filled with papers, ideas, maps, and diagrams. Narrator of key stories. Always seeking something just over the next ridge.

name: Vagabu Olt
description: Same figure as Bagbu Olt. Name varies in different sources.

name: Yeller
description: Sometimes described as a single creature, sometimes as five women who move together. Only one of Yeller's kind has been found anywhere.

name: Vornis Keth
description: Author of treatises on spatial philosophy. Theorized about curved coordinates and boundary instability.

name: Archon Prebel
description: Discovered that instrument-free observation produces stability. The Prebel Effect named after them.

name: Esseny Moll
description: Maps locations where multiple simultaneous observations contradict. Expert on spatial anomalies.

name: Moat Engineer Krehl
description: Testified before the Senate about boundary maintenance. Key figure in The Senator's Question.

name: Vivian Hammond
description: Tutors children in ice-fishing puzzles. Key figure in the puzzle courses. Subject of the 'Vivian Effect'.

name: Little Porn
description: Created the LPN language system. Child prodigy turned inventor of formal notation.

name: Quonxy
description: Created CSQ notation system as rival to LPN. Also tutors in Hilly Dale.

name: Senior Keeper Mivros
description: Oversees the Densworld Oracle system. Guides students in the Oracle course.

name: Forgemaster Krenn
description: Expert in fine-tuning language models. Key figure in the Forge at Yeller Quarry.
appears_in_courses: HF Series: Forge at Yeller Quarry

name: Master Cartographer Olis
description: Creates semantic maps. Key figure in the Expedition Cartographer's Workshop.

name: Senior Inference Clerk Morwen
description: Processes disputed folios for authenticity. Key figure in the Archivist's Inference Engine.

name: Chief Engineer Vastos
description: Deploys interfaces to Hugging Face Spaces. Key figure in Space Builders of Mirado.

name: Elder Nomis
description: Evaluates and adapts to new models. Key figure in the Wanderer's Experiments.

name: Archivist Questioner Dren
description: Extracts datasets from messy archives. Key figure in Noise and Signal.

name: Jackson
description: Disappeared from Klutch Community College. Central mystery of the Densmok CC course.

name: Kitchum
description: Student with suspicious behavioral patterns. Key investigation target in Densmok CC.

name: Thurmond Gast
description: Protagonist of the 'naive observer' arc. Arrives at the Dens boundary without preconceptions.
